chezmoi add $HOME${/}.bashrc
exists $HOME${/}.local${/}share${/}chezmoi${/}dot_bashrc

chezmoi chattr +empty $HOME${/}.bashrc
exists $HOME${/}.local${/}share${/}chezmoi${/}empty_dot_bashrc

chezmoi chattr +template $HOME${/}.bashrc
exists $HOME${/}.local${/}share${/}chezmoi${/}empty_dot_bashrc.tmpl

chezmoi chattr +private $HOME${/}.bashrc
exists $HOME${/}.local${/}share${/}chezmoi${/}private_empty_dot_bashrc.tmpl

chezmoi chattr noempty $HOME${/}.bashrc
exists $HOME${/}.local${/}share${/}chezmoi${/}private_dot_bashrc.tmpl

chezmoi chattr -- -template $HOME${/}.bashrc
exists $HOME${/}.local${/}share${/}chezmoi${/}private_dot_bashrc

chezmoi chattr nop $HOME${/}.bashrc
exists $HOME${/}.local${/}share${/}chezmoi${/}dot_bashrc

-- home/user/.bashrc --
# contents of .bashrc
